actionUnits.condition: Invoke HouseController.changeLights() on House (MonoBehaviour component fileID: 821553098848002451, m_Script guid: 340adb04e4e259e4b9c3e716ea2e6ced). Initial scene config: lightStatus=false; Start() already calls changeLights once. This manual call validates emission color update on windowGlassObjects to lightsOffEmissionColor with _EMISSION enabled. Note: House has no Rigidbody/Collider/EventTrigger; direct method invocation is required pending interaction setup. AudioSource 'switchSound' should NOT play unless lightStatus toggles via Update.

MonoBehaviour_0 (fileID: 227156925, guid: 243873248f8e3f6468b009a9e2d86557) is MoonController attached to Moon, with 'player' bound to Player Transform (fileID: 1121179986) per scene meta. Moon has no Rigidbody/Collider but attached script runs Start/Update automatically. Waiting allows Update() to execute and set transform.rotation = LookRotation(player.position - transform.position), validating the serialized reference and rotation behavior.
